name: PCaPP
tagline: Repository for XMLs for Perkus Maxamus
body:
### Welcome to PCaPP
[PCaPP](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59257) is the official home for XML updates for T3nd0's [Perkus Maxamus](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59849).  
On this Gitpage you can submit new code to be added to make sure mods you love have the best support possible, or you can request support for a mod using the [issue tracker](https://github.com/Raulfin/PCaPP/issues).


### Authors and Contributors
@Raulfin  
@Tascani  

### Support or Contact
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
